title: Ep. 27 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Tom Segura & Bert Kreischer
description: In this episode of 2 Bears, 1 Cave, Tom Segura and Bert Kreischer discuss vulgar tweets, how their parents differ, and music they hate. They also take a look at Bert's surprise birthday video for Tom. What's the best present YOU'VE ever been given?
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
